name: Felt Cats - DEMO
description:
Help our kittens against hungry aliens who want to conquer the earth in this amazing PC game..

  • Cute felt aesthetics.
  • Use incredible powers and special shots.
  • Family friendly
  • Compatible with gamepad and keyboard.
  • One player (two players in the full version).
  • One stage in demo version.
  • KITTENS!!!!
